topic.title: Creating a team favorite card view

section.title: How to create a team favorite card view
section.hint: If you want to create a My favorite you can follow the same steps below.

steps.item: Sign in to Mingle and open the project for which to create team favorites (if you're not currently working in the project).
Filter the card list to isolate the cards you want to work with. If you have existing similar tabs or saved views setup, you can open one of these as a starting point and then change the filters.
Select whether you want to view these cards as a grid or list.

bullets.title: If viewing in a List
bullets.item: To add or remove columns, click the Add / remove columns link and select from the list of properties displayed.
Properties with an orange tick are already present in the view - select these to remove them.

bullets.title: If viewing in a Grid
bullets.item: Select the group by and color by options. For example, you may group by Priority and color by Status.
Choose an aggregate to display in the column headings. For example Sum of Estimate

Add or remove columns as needed by clicking the Add / remove columns link and selecting an option from the menu. This lets you view a card property that is not currently attached to any card so you can drag cards to another property value.

item.p: Open the Team Favorites sidebar control.

screenshot.alttext: Team Favorites sidebar control - add current view to team favorites link

item.hint: In 3.1, Mingle highlights the name of the favorite the user is currently looking at from the favorites sidebar.

item.p: Click the "Add current view to team favorites..." link. Mingle opens up a dialog to let you enter a name for the saved view.
item.hint: If you want to create a My favorite click the "Add current view to my favorites..." link.

steps.item: Type a name for the team favorite.

Click the Save button. Mingle creates the team favorite. All team members can now access this view by clicking the Team Favorites link. You can manage this team favorite via Project admin tab Team Favorites & tabs link.
